net.sf.freecol.common.i18n

Class NameCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.freecol.common.i18n.NameCache

  • public class NameCache
extends java.lang.Object
    A cache of proper names of various types. Most of these collections auto-initialize when the public accessor is called, but the cities of Cibola are different because they are saved in the Game, and hence requireCitiesOfCibola has to public for generating a new game, and there are clear/add/get routines to allow the the collection to be serialized.

        Returns:

      • getUnitName

        public static java.lang.String getUnitName(Player player,
                                           UnitType type,
                                           java.util.Random random)
        Gets a new name for a unit. Currently only names naval units, not specific to type. FIXME: specific names for types.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player who will own the unit.
        type - The UnitType to choose a name for.
        random - A pseudo-random number source.
        Returns:
        A name for the unit, or null if not available.
